extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    Level 4 and Registration in an ENSC Major, ENVS Medial, EBIO, ECHM, EGEO, EGPY, ELSC or ETOX Plan or permission of the School.
EXCLUSION    No more than 1 course from ENSC 410/3.0; ENSC 430/6.0

basic.description:
Interdisciplinary study of the scientific, socio-political, and economic aspects of selected local, national, or global issues related to environmental sustainability. Teamwork is emphasized. 
NOTE    One full-day weekend field trip: estimated cost $20.
basic.subject: ENSC
basic.title: Honours Projects in Environmental Sustainability
